content: Align local dev database schema/defaults with production (Alembic baseline + migrations)
Backfill existing canvas rows with non-null defaults (palette_type, collaboration_mode, auto_save_interval, is_public, is_moderated)
Seed local dev with minimal realistic data aligned to prod (palettes, collaboration modes)
Verify CORS config for local dev allows http://localhost:3000 and add tests/checks
